# Scrabble Word Builder - Development Instructions

## Project Overview
A TypeScript CLI application that finds the highest-scoring valid Scrabble word from a player's rack of letters, with optional support for building upon existing board words.

## Tech Stack
- Node.js 18+
- TypeScript for type safety
- Commander.js for CLI
- Jest for testing
- Express.js (optional) for web API

## Setup Status
- [x] Project structure created
- [x] TypeScript configuration
- [x] Package.json and dependencies defined
- [ ] Dependencies installed
- [ ] Data files created (dictionary, letter scores)
- [ ] Core modules implemented
- [ ] Tests written and passing
- [ ] CLI functional
- [ ] Documentation complete

## Next Steps
1. Install dependencies: `npm install`
2. Create letter_data.json with Scrabble letter scores
3. Create dictionary.txt with valid words
4. Implement core modules (types, data-loader, validator, scorer, word-finder)
5. Implement CLI interface
6. Write and run tests
